verses.verse: The LORD<WH3068> showed<WH7200> me, and, behold,<WH2009> two<WH8147> baskets<WH1736> of figs<WH8384> were set<WH3259> before<WH6440> the temple<WH1964> of the LORD,<WH3068> after<WH310> that Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> had carried<WH1540> away captive<WH1540> Jeconiah<WH3204> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and the princes<WH8269> of Judah,<WH3063> with the carpenters<WH2796> and smiths,<WH4525> from Jerusalem,<WH3389> and had brought<WH935> them to Babylon.<WH894>

One<WH259> basket<WH1731> had very<WH3966> good<WH2896> figs,<WH8384> even like the figs<WH8384> that are first<WH1073> ripe: and the other<WH259> basket<WH1731> had very<WH3966> naughty<WH7451> figs,<WH8384> which<WH834> could not be eaten,<WH398> they were so bad.<WH7451>

Then said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> to me, What<WH4100> see<WH7200> you, Jeremiah?<WH3414> And I said,<WH559> Figs;<WH8384> the good<WH2896> figs,<WH8384> very<WH3966> good;<WH2896> and the evil,<WH7451> very<WH3966> evil,<WH7451> that cannot<WH3808> be eaten,<WH398> they are so evil.<WH7455>
Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel;<WH3478> Like these<WH428> good<WH2896> figs,<WH8384> so<WH3651> will I acknowledge<WH5234> them that are carried<WH1546> away captive<WH1546> of Judah,<WH3063> whom<WH834> I have sent<WH7971> out of this<WH2088> place<WH4725> into the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans<WH3778> for their good.<WH2896>

For I will set<WH7760> my eyes<WH5869> on them for good,<WH2896> and I will bring<WH7725> them again<WH7725> to this<WH2063> land:<WH776> and I will build<WH1129> them, and not pull<WH2040> them down; and I will plant<WH5193> them, and not pluck<WH5428> them up.

And I will give<WH5414> them an heart<WH3820> to know<WH3045> me, that I am the LORD:<WH3068> and they shall be my people,<WH5971> and I will be their God:<WH430> for they shall return<WH7725> to me with their whole<WH3605> heart.<WH3820>

And as the evil<WH7451> figs,<WH8384> which<WH834> cannot<WH3808> be eaten,<WH398> they are so evil;<WH7455> surely<WH3588> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> So<WH3651> will I give<WH5414> Zedekiah<WH6667> the king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and his princes,<WH8269> and the residue<WH7611> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> that remain<WH7604> in this<WH2063> land,<WH776> and them that dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714>

And I will deliver<WH5414> them to be removed<WH2189> into all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth<WH776> for their hurt,<WH7451> to be a reproach<WH2781> and a proverb,<WH4912> a taunt<WH8148> and a curse,<WH7045> in all<WH3605> places<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> I shall drive<WH5080> them.

And I will send<WH7971> the sword,<WH2719> the famine,<WH7458> and the pestilence,<WH1698> among them, till<WH5704> they be consumed<WH8552> from off<WH5921> the land<WH127> that I gave<WH5414> to them and to their fathers.<WH1>
